      • getDistance

        public static double getDistance(Airport2 departAp,
                                 Airport2 destinationAp)
        Calculate distance of two airport
        Parameters:
        departAp - Code of depart airport
        destinationAp - Code of arrive airport
        Returns:
        distance of depart airport "departAp" and destination airport "destinationAp"

      • findFlightsOnDay

        public static java.util.ArrayList<Flight> findFlightsOnDay(java.lang.String ticketAgency,
                                                           java.lang.String departApCd,
                                                           java.util.Date deriseDpTimeMin,
                                                           java.util.Date desireDpTimeMax)
                                                    throws java.lang.Exception
        Get all flights depart from one airport to another between the time window specified by "desireDpTimeMin" and "desireDpTimeMax". Note that, the "desireDpTimeMin" and "desireDpTimeMax" are both in local time of the departing airport, however, the flights depart from one airport on a specific day in our server is organized in GMT time. So we have to convert them to GMT time in order to find out which day should we request from the server.
        Parameters:
        ticketAgency -
        departApCd - Code of depart airport
        deriseDpTimeMin - the earliest time customer want to take off (local time of departing airport)
        desireDpTimeMax - the latest time customer want to take off (local time of departing airport)
        Returns:
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception

      • getChildren

        public static java.util.ArrayList<Flight> getChildren(int flag,
                                                      java.lang.String departApCd,
                                                      java.lang.String destinationCd,
                                                      java.util.Date desireDpTimeMin,
                                                      java.util.Date desireDpTimeMax,
                                                      java.util.HashMap<java.lang.String,Airport2> airports,
                                                      java.lang.String ticketAgency)
                                               throws java.lang.Exception
        Get all possible Flights from one airport to another on a specific day during a specific time-window, including direct flights and connecting flights.
        Parameters:
        flag - When flag=0, the possible stop-over airports' latitude should be between the latitude of depart airport and latitude of arrive airport, if flag=1, the possible stop-over airports' longitude should be between the longitude of depart airport and longitude of arrive airport.
        departApCd - Code of depart airport
        destinationCd - Code of arrive airport
        airports - HashMap of all airports contained in our database, the key is airport Code, the value including airport latitude and longitude
        ticketAgency - In our case, this is "Team04"
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception

      • doSearch

        public static java.util.ArrayList<java.util.ArrayList<Flight>> doSearch(java.lang.String sourceApCd,
                                                                        java.lang.String destinationCd,
                                                                        java.lang.String departDay,
                                                                        java.util.Date desireDpTime)
                                                                 throws java.lang.Exception
        Get all possible Flights from one airport to another on a specific day after a specific time, including direct flights and connecting flights.
        Parameters:
        sourceApCd - Code of depart airport
        destinationCd - Code of arrive airport
        departDay - Depart day
        desireDpTime - Customer want to depart after the time specified by "desireDpTime"
        Returns:
        All flights from depart airport to arrive airport, including direct flights and connecting flights.
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception
